statements: SELECT id, post_id, likes, comments, shares, engagement_level FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares, engagement_level, id FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics;
SELECT post_id, engagement_level, comments, shares, likes, id FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics;
SELECT id, post_id, likes, engagement_level, shares, comments FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics;
SELECT likes, post_id, id, shares, comments, engagement_level FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_id, engagement_level, likes, comments FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 50;
SELECT post_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(comments) AS total_comments FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, AVG(engagement_level) AS avg_engagement FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics GROUP BY post_id HAVING avg_engagement > 4;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, audience_segment FROM marketing_strategies WHERE audience_segment = 'Youth';
SELECT success_metric, strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies WHERE success_metric = 'ROI';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE comments >= 50 ORDER BY comments DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, audience_segment, success_metric FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT id, platform, likes FROM engagement_metrics WHERE platform='Facebook';
SELECT platform, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT id, platform, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE shares BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND comments > 50;
SELECT platform, post_id, likes, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT target_audience, engagement_goal FROM marketing_strategies WHERE engagement_goal < 500;
SELECT age_group, gender, location, interests FROM audience_demographics WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT platform, post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE platform = 'Facebook' AND shares > 10;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE followers > 500;
SELECT post_id, content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > CURDATE();
SELECT user_id, post_id, likes, comments FROM engagements WHERE shares < 10;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE likes > 10 ORDER BY post_id DESC
SELECT username, followers FROM users WHERE followers > 100 ORDER BY followers ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT post_id, content FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT user_id, comments FROM engagements WHERE comments > 5
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_name, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT account_name, engagement_rate FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT account_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM social_media_accounts JOIN posts ON social_media_accounts.account_id = posts.account_id GROUP BY account_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts
SELECT account_name, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_name, count(*) AS total_posts FROM social_media_accounts JOIN posts ON social_media_accounts.account_id = posts.account_id GROUP BY account_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC
SELECT account_name, COUNT(likes.like_id) AS total_likes FROM social_media_accounts JOIN likes ON social_media_accounts.account_id = likes.account_id GROUP BY account_name ORDER BY total_likes DESC
